nodes.text: The Duo blaster carbine was a dual-barreled blaster carbine produced by the SoroSuub Corporation and sold for 1,200 credits. The barrels of the 2.5-kilogram weapon were positioned vertically with an upper and lower barrel. The weapon had a maximum range of 200 meters, and users could fire the barrels separately or together. The weapon lacked a stun setting and used power pack that cost 100 credits and held fifty shots.
